title: UPDATE: Nyko Playpad works!
comment: I was able to get the Playpad to work with this app and the HID install package off the link shown in details. Finally synced and connected to my HTC EVO 3D using iCAD mode on both controller and app with minor key mapping issues. Need to figure out how to get the Start/Select buttons to work. For now, I have remapped them to the extra shoulder buttons. The following emulators I tested that work with the Nyko Playpad and Bluez IME: John NES, SNESDroid, SuperGNES, GENPLUSDroid, Mupen64 Plus AE, and ePSXe.

title: Wiimote
comment: The secret here is have the Wiimote pin in the clipboard. To find the pin put the whole address in a hexadecimal converter. Take the last 4 numbers in reverse order and put them in the clipboard and it will connect without asking.

title: LISTEN UP
comment: If you are having trouble with multiple remotes using the same button profile:  You have to change the buttons for each controller individually. The profiles are "global", but you can set the buttons for controller 1 and controller 2 etc WITHIN the profile by editing the buttons from each controller's configuration screen.

title: Awesome Bluetooth App!
comment: Works Great with my Custom PSX VINYSON Controller! Metal Gear Solid Rocks Properly Now! Even better than on my PSP!

When you are done using bluez simply reselect your keyboard as the input device (Select IME) in the bluez app and it will end the program so no need for task killer. You would need to reselect your keyboard when you are done with bluez anyway so just do it in the bluez app and it is like clicking an exit button.
